Package com.movlad.semviz.core.sqm

Class SQM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.core.sqm.SQM
  • public class SQM
extends java.lang.Object
    The Semviz Query Manager (SQM) is a singleton used for loading a Semviz directory and retrieving semantic descriptions of clouds using SPARQL queries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<SemanticCloudDescription> exec​(java.lang.String queryString)
      Executes a SPARQL query on the active Semviz directory and returns the list of successfully retrieved instances of SemanticCloudDescription.

      • getInstance

        public static SQM getInstance()

      • getModel

        public org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel getModel()
        Returns:
        the active ontology model currently loaded within the query manager

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns:
        the path to the active Semviz directory

      • getFailCount

        public int getFailCount()
        Returns:
        the number of SemanticCloudDescription instances that could not be retrieved on the last query

      • load

        public void load​(java.lang.String path)
          throws InvalidDirectoryException,
                 java.nio.file.NotDirectoryException,
                 java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Attempts to load a Semviz directory.
        Parameters:
        path - is the absolute path to the Semviz directory to be loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
        java.nio.file.NotDirectoryException - if the file at the given path is not a directory
        InvalidDirectoryException - if the directory does not contain an ontology

      • exec

        public java.util.List<SemanticCloudDescription> exec​(java.lang.String queryString)
        Executes a SPARQL query on the active Semviz directory and returns the list of successfully retrieved instances of SemanticCloudDescription.
        Parameters:
        queryString - is the SPARQL query to be executed
        Returns:
        the list of successfully retrieved instances of SemanticCloudDescription.
